Projects.Title: 🌐 This site
Projects.Description: Handcrafted with Hugo. Blazing fast generation and pretty impressive Lighthouse scores.

Projects.Title: 🖋️ Yours, Kewbish
Projects.Description: My personal blog. Features a collection of tech-related tutorials, articles, and personal stories. RSS feed included.

Projects.Title: 🌊 DiveIntoHT.ML
Projects.Description: An interactive short course designed to teach the basics of web design. Accumulated 350+ users, recommended by several CS teachers.

Projects.Title: 🔮 Obviate
Projects.Description: A Vue-based webapp utilizing the power of GitHub's APIs, making static site generation and configuration simple for non-techies.

Projects.Title: 🎙️ GCIers Podcast
Projects.Description: A monthly tech podcast featuring several Liquid Galaxy GCI students. We discuss tech and open source news.

Projects.Title: 💸 Revshare.js
Projects.Description: A lightweight Javascript library to bring easy revenue-sharing capabilities to any site. Won the Grant For The Web Hackathon grand prize.

Projects.Title: 💵 Revshare for GitHub
Projects.Description: A Chrome extension, bringing Web Monetization technologies to GitHub. Allows creators of any repo and its dependencies to receive revenue through the Web Monetization API.

Projects.Title: 📸 Zoomy
Projects.Description: A minimalist Zoom utility for the terminal, including aliases and streamlined meeting access. Super useful during the Age of Zoom.

Projects.Title: 🤖 Justin
Projects.Description: A command-line interface for automating common workflows and development tasks. Make getting set up easy, with useful commands.

Projects.Title: 👩‍🏫 Kenna
Projects.Description: A non-developer-friendly interface for teachers to create customizable, configurable web presences. Consider this a Obviate prototype and precursor.

Projects.Title: 📓 Opus
Projects.Description: A Kivy-based mobile app for book tracking. Built-in author-fill and email report generation.
